name: Nike Shoes
description: Nike's footwear collections often feature iconic models that have left a lasting impact on sports culture. From the timeless Air Force 1 to the groundbreaking Air Max series, Nike has created shoes that have become cultural symbols and fashion statements.

name: Jordans
description: Air Jordan shoes, a signature line under the Nike brand, have become a cultural phenomenon since their introduction in the 1980s. Named after basketball legend Michael Jordan, these shoes transcend the realm of athletic footwear, symbolizing a unique blend of performance, style, and cultural impact.
